Commands.Octaslash: 7-hit melee BRV attack + HP attackRaises Jenova level by 1Jenova: lowers all enemies' SPD, raises own SPD; SPD boost based on level, up to 4
Commands.Black Materia: Set all foes' BRV to 0 (except foes that are broken).Raises BRV based on Attack then inflicts an AoE HP attack.Deals 100% HP damage to all enemies.Grants 1 stack of "Reunion" for 5 turns (max is 5).Doesn't consume ability use on the next turn."Reunion" raises Max BRV and regens BRV based on the number of stacks.

Artifacts.Buffed Guard: Raises Defense Power by 10% while buffed.
Artifacts.One-Winged Angel Boost: Increases the effects of One-Winged Angel by 5%.
Artifacts.Mighty Fervent Blow: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Fervent Blow by 10%.
Artifacts.Mighty Octaslash: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Octaslash by 10%.

Passives.Fervent Blow Boost: Slightly raises Max BRV for 1 turn after using Fervent Blow.
Passives.Critical BRV Gain: Grants a small amount of BRV after inflicting a critical hit.
Passives.Break Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Octaslash Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack for 1 turn after using Octaslash.
Passives.Fervent Blow Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Fervent Blow.
Passives.The Planet's Life: Slightly raises Break Bonus earned when gaining Jenova stacks.
Passives.Octaslash Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Octaslash.
Passives.One-Winged Angel: Slightly raises Initial BRV, Max BRV, Attack and Defense if HP is Max when the final battle starts.
